altername_name: Fully Cowled Mini Yonku: Super Factory
Full Cowled Mini Yonku: Super Factory
name: Full Cowl Mini Yonku Super Factory
overview: Full Cowl Mini Yonku Super Factory (フルカウルミニ四駆 スーパーファクトリー) is a 1997 game by Nextech and Media Quest tying into a toy car line and what appears to be a different anime. In it, you design a car that you want to race around tracks, but you don't actually race — the car races on its own.
